title: Amanda Seyfried Joins Twin Peaks Revival
content: Amanda Seyfried will have a major role in Showtime's Twin Peaks revival, according to TVLine . No details on Seyfried's character have been revealed, but she will appear in multiple episodes. Seyfried's previous television credits include Big Love , Veronica Mars , All My Children and As the World Turns . As of now, the only other confirmed cast member in the David Lynch series is original star Kyle MacLachlan, but earlier this summer Showtime's David Nevins teased fans could expect many familiar faces to return.
